patterns: What kinds of items are there?
responses: We sell all types of groceries.
We accept Cryptocurrency Payments using DAI stable coin as well as VISA, Mastercard.

patterns: What is required for crypto payments?
Which crypto coin do you accept?
responses:
To pay using cryptocurrency,
You have to setup metamask wallet extension in your browser.
Add your accounts that has DAI stable coin.
Then you can easily pay using your wallet.
Note: We accept only DAI stable coin

patterns: When do I get my delivery?
responses: Delivery takes 1-2 days
Shipping takes 1-2 days

patterns: Prducts are worst and not satisfied
Product quality need to be improved
responses: Sorry for the inconvenience
We will try to improve our service
Reasons include seller sourcing issues, courier issues, cross border shipment delay, wrong address or Mobile Number, and Unavailability of customer.

patterns: can I talk to an agent
responses:
Sure you can Contact Growcomers at +91-00000000 or info@growcomers.com
Timings are from 09:00 AM to 05:00 PM from Monday to Friday.

patterns: How do I can cancel my order
responses: Please visit the My Orders page in your profile to manage your orders and to view the status.

patterns: How can I change my profile information
I want to change my phone number
How to change my phone number
I want to change my name
responses:
You can easily update your account details by following the steps below:
Step 1: Click on 'Account',
Step 2: Click on 'Profile',
Step 3: Click on edit button,
Step 4: Update name and mobile number, and click on Save.

patterns: How can I change my email
I want to change my email
responses: Changing or updating email once verified is not possible.

You can easily add or update your address details by following the steps below:
Step 1: Click on 'Account',
Step 2: Click on 'Addresses'
Then you can edit, delete or add addresses.

patterns: I want to change my password
I want to Reset my password
responses:
You can easily change your password by following the steps below:
Step 1: Click on 'Account',
Step 2: Click on 'Profile',
Step 3: Click on 'Change Password' button,
Step 4: Enter your old password and new password,
Step5: Click on Save.

patterns: I want to delete my account
I want to deactivate my account
responses:
You can easily deactivate your account by following the steps below:
Step 1: Click on 'Account',
Step 2: Click on 'Profile',
Step 3: Click on 'Deactivate' button,
Step 4: Click on 'confirm' button
This will deactivate your account.
